name: good first issue
description: Is a good starting point for a new contributor to the project.

name: help wanted
description: Issue requires assistance from others in order to be completed.

name: ⛔️ status: discarded
description: Issue has been discarded and is no longer being worked on.

name: ✨ goal: improvement
description: Issue is focused on improving an existing feature or aspect of the project.

name: 🚀 goal: feature
description: Issue is focused on adding a new feature or aspect to the project.

name: ❓ talk: question
description: Issue requires clarification or additional information.

name: 🏁 status: ready for dev
description: Issue has been reviewed and is ready for development.

name: 💬 talk: discussion
description: Issue requires discussion or input from others.

name: 💻 aspect: code
description: Issue relates to the code of the project.

name: 📄 aspect: text
description: Issue relates to text or documentation.

name: 🔒 staff only
description: Issue is only visible to staff members and not the general public.

name: 🕹 aspect: interface
description: Issue relates to the interface of the project.

name: 🚦 status: awaiting triage
description: Issue is waiting to be triaged, or reviewed and prioritized.

name: 🚧 status: blocked
description: Issue is blocked by another issue or dependency.

name: 🛠 goal: Bugfix
description: Issue is focused on fixing a problem or bug.

name: 🟥 priority: critical
description: Issue is of the highest priority and needs to be addressed immediately.

name: 🟧 priority: high
description: Task or item has a high priority and should be given immediate attention.

name: 🟨 priority: medium
description: Task or item has a medium priority and should be given attention in a timely manner.

name: 🟩 priority: low
description: Task or item has a low priority and can be given attention at a lower priority.

name: 🤖 aspect: dx
description: Task or item is related to the development experience.

name: 🧹 status: ticket work required
description: This label

name: 🔢 points: 1
description: Point value of a task or item, with the number indicating the value.

name: 🔢 points: 2
description: Point value of a task or item, with the number indicating the value.

name: 🔢 points: 3
description: Point value of a task or item, with the number indicating the value.
